title: Daz3D - Scion for Genesis 3 Male
description:
___________________________________________________________________________________

Details
___________________________________________________________________________________

A morph and Gothic texture pack for Genesis 3 Male.

Scion's (pronounced sy-on) head and base body morphs are made with a mix of merchant resources and Hexagon so there is no need for additional morph packages.

His package includes 4 make up sets, a liquid latex like make up design option (with matching anatomical element materials to match) as well as a second matte latex design option, base anatomical element materials, 4 regular eye materials, 2 fantasy eye materials, 4 contact and 1 sclera contact materials, as well as a few tattoo options to add into the mix.

Scion is not your everyday style of male for your Library needs; he is his own style.

What's Included and Features

Scion for Genesis 3 Male (.DUF)

Character Preset

Shaping Presets:
Shape 1 Full Apply/Rem (Custom)
Body Apply/Rem (Custom)
Head Apply/Rem (Custom)

Material Options:
Base Skin
Base Anatomical Elements

Face Options:
Face with Brown Eyebrows, No Scruff
Face with Dark Eyebrows, with Scruff
Face with No Eyebrows

Eye Options:
4 Regular Eyes
2 Fantasy Eyes
1 Cornea Contacts
4 Iris Contacts

Makeup Options:
4 Face Paint Makeups
Darkness Matte Latex
Liquid Latex H.Mat Preset
Liquid Latex Anatomical Elements
Base Body Reset

Tattoo Options:
2 Arm Tattoos
1 Leg Tattoo
Liquid Latex versions for each Tattoo

Textures Include:
80 Texture, Transparency, Bump, Displacement and Sub-Surface Scatter Maps (2000 x 2000 up to 4096 x 4096)
This product uses the Genesis 3 Base Male UV Maps
Daz Studio Iray Material Presets (.DUF)
___________________________________________________________________________________

Official Link
 
http://www.daz3d.com/scion-for-genesis-3-male
